listitem.para: Media ioctl request code as defined in the media.h header file, for example MEDIA_IOC_SETUP_LINK.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The ioctl() function manipulates media device parameters. The argument fd must be an open file descriptor.
The ioctl request code specifies the media function to be called. It has encoded in it whether the argument is an input, output or read/write parameter, and the size of the argument argp in bytes.

Macros and structures definitions specifying media ioctl requests and their parameters are located in the media.h header file. All media ioctl requests, their respective function and parameters are specified in .
